about_the_game:
The dark warlock Ulag'Bol, slumbering for a millennium, has finally awakened. He has manipulated and corrupted countless thralls in his relentless pursuit of power. Those who dared to oppose him were met with a terrible fate: banishment to his underground prison crypt – a fate that now awaits the heroes of this very tale.

Choose your champion from among three imprisoned heroes:

  • The Knight: A paragon of loyalty and valor, specializing in all forms of traditional combat.

  • The Thief: A master of stealth and deceit, specializing in quick strikes, potent poisons, and alchemical ingenuity.

  • The Mage: A wielder of potent magic, commanding the elements with arcane knowledge and devastating spells.

Each hero possesses a unique set of cards and equipment, unlocking distinct playstyles for every run. Furthermore, each hero offers multiple starting decks to tailor your strategy to your preferred approach.

Your quest for vengeance unfolds through the Dungeon Deck. At the start of each act, a unique Dungeon Deck is assembled, filled with challenging enemy encounters and intriguing events. After each confrontation, you'll face a crucial decision: choose from three randomly drawn dungeon cards.

Will you fight an enemy to hone your skills and reap valuable rewards? Or will you seek out the merchant, eager to acquire new equipment and bolster your arsenal for the battles ahead?

Mastering the art of choosing the right dungeon card at the right time is paramount to overcoming the formidable Ulag'Bol and achieving your ultimate revenge.

Challenge Modes

Unlock exciting new challenges after successful runs! These modes offer unique twists and increased difficulty, pushing your skills to the limit. Prove your strength and master the game with progressively harder challenges.

Unlockable Cards

Earn powerful new cards for each class with every playthrough! These cards unlock fresh strategic possibilities, allowing you to refine existing builds or experiment with innovative deck compositions."

name: Prisoners of Ulag'Bol: A Dungeon Crawling Deckbuilder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-10400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-10400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a quest of revenge against the dark lord Ulag'Bol in this dungeon-crawling deckbuilder! Choose your class and starting deck, then delve into a three-act roguelike adventure. Collect powerful cards and equipment to unlock devastating synergies and defeat Ulag'Bol and claim your freedom!
